readImages(Map<String, Float>, boolean, double) - Method in class Ctrl.Controller
Reads a list of images from a set if filenames and exposure times.
ReinhardMapping - Class in View.ToneMappers
Implements the Reinhard global Tone-Mapper parameters: hdr: high dynamic range radiance map, a matrix of size rows * columns * 3 % luminance map: the corresponding lumiance map of the hdr image

Matlab Code from : http://cybertron.cg.tu-berlin.de/eitz/hdr/

ReinhardMapping(double) - Constructor for class View.ToneMappers.ReinhardMapping
